reviewText: It was a gift.  I have read it in the past and consider it well worth reading.
Didn't give a lot of info, just some help!

My wife and I have a Strong-Willed Child.
Others had recommended this video and we were (and still are) near our wits end on how to train up our son.

After watching the video we both didn't feel it helped us any. This is not a knock on Dr Dobson or the entertainment value; we just didn't glean anything new from the video.

So far the only resource that has actually helped us has been No Drama Discipline.

Good luck with your strong willed kiddo!
It was good. However it didn't really address our concerns.
good old school information need more like it today.
